Comment:
Use to screw top piece to base piece.

You could get stainless or black depending on your preference. Note the McMaster Carr screws are actually M2.5; these are slightly smaller than the Ali Express screws and I have not tried them

Use to screw plate/PCB to base piece.

You could get stainless or black depending on your preference. Note the McMaster Carr screws are actually M2.5; these are slightly smaller than the Ali Express screws and I have not tried them
See the readme for more details
See the electrical BOM and readme for more details
Use your favorite Cherry MX compatible switches. Microcenter tends to have good prices on these if you have a local store. Make sure you get ones with a clear top if you're using the LEDs!
You’ll have more options if you don’t look for backlit keycaps, but choose what you want!
These are also pretty generic and available from most keyboard parts suppliers. This design uses plate-mount stabs without the nubs on the bottom (but you can always clip these off).
